mapper.select: select * from tbl_board order by bno desc
select * from tbl_board order by bno desc limit #{pageStart}, #{amount}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (title, content, writer, filename) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{filename})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_board SET view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(l.number) AS like_count FROM tbl_board b LEFT JOIN tbl_board_like l ON b.bno = l.bno WHERE b.bno = #{bno} GROUP BY b.bno, b.title, b.content, b.view_cnt
SELECT * FROM tbl_board WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') ORDER BY BNO ASC
